Review.Titre: Scammed!
Review.Contenu: Skye never told me to expect a bill to get my old battery back, IF they determined it to be within spec. They probably feel entitled to do this apparently because of it being in some fine print somewhere. Skye had at least fifteen minutes to explain THAT to me during our phone conversation regarding how to fill out the complicated online ONLY return process, you know, in order to return the exact same battery which they conveniently sold to me over the phone. However,  Skye did somehow find time to tell me during this complicated "warranty" return process, that I would have to pay for shipping to get it to them for any "warranty" (the bait?). Nothing but crickets regarding a MUCH higher, or ANY return shipping costs to me in order to get my original battery back?!  Please don't blame me for being doubtful about the "failed warranty", or "within spec" test results at this point. Or,  for feeling scammed by what I consider "the switch".   Skyes' lack of transparency, and honesty regarding return to Owner shipping costs likely wasn't accidental, or inadvertent. This whole return, & so called "warranty" transaction was definitely not transparent, or honest... Therefore I do NOT recommend this business.

Review.Titre: AIMS 3200W generator w/ auto start
Review.Contenu: Let me first say that I have used AIMS inverters and other products for quite a while and have found the products to be second to none in terms of performance and reliability. I will also say that their technical support people are unbelievably knowledgeable, helpful and available. I purchased the AIMS 3200 watt portable generator based on that experience and because of the auto start feature on this generator. It was compatible with my inverter and pointed toward a solution I was striving to achieve. I purchased AIMS LiFePo4 batteries, which are awesome and rebuilt my entire power station based on the auto start feature of this generator. When I had the entire system rebuilt, I put it to the test. It failed the test. When the inverter told the gen to start, it tried to start but did not. I reset the test multiple times and it failed every time. When I spoke to tech support, they asked about the outside temperature and when I told them it was slightly below freezing, they indicated that the lower operating range was about 30 degrees for a start. Given that temperature had a lot to do with the reason for converting to auto start, this rendered the generator useless to me. Despite the issue, when I returned the generator for a refund, I had to pay shipping for the return, a 20% restock fee and their cost of the initial shipping, a loss to me of about $350. I have reviewed the descriptions of this generator and there is no mention of this shortcoming. Given that a portable generator has it's place in cold surrondings, winter RVers, mountain cabins, etc., this seems to be a appropriate issue to mention. I feel a bit ripped off by my loss of $350. I'll likely continue to purchase AIMS products (assuming one of my inverters ever fails) but I certainly would not recommend this particular product.

Review.Contenu: During the purchase process the help was great after the purchase I called with a concern and was treated very poorly like my business was no longer valuable.

Review.Titre: Taking my business elsewhere
Review.Contenu: Using the website, I placed an order and specified General Delivery to a post office since we were traveling.  I also paid for 2 day shipping.The website software dropped the General Delivery part and the item was never delivered.We were eventually refunded our purchase price, but not our 2 day shipping even though this was a website error.  The shipping cost almost as much as the item.We sent an email to ask about this but no one ever responded.Will not use this company in the future.UPDATE: You are correct. We should have reviewed the order information that was sent to us more carefully.However, you have misrepresented several of the facts and have been misinformed as to what was actually said.Also, I will be glad to forward the email we sent earlier if you would like to see it. It seems from your tone and attitude that this would not have made a difference anyway. We stand by our original review.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service
Review.Contenu: I’m happy with the inverter I purchased, but the customer service was very poor.  I ordered a remote with my inverter and they did not send it.  When I informed them of the missing part they said they would send it right out, but after another week I called again and they finally looked into it and figured out it went clear across the US in the wrong direction and finally got it turned around.  It showed up after my big trip where I needed it.  Their shop is only 3 hours away from me, but they couldn’t get me the part in time.  When I contacted them they could have cared less.  I gave them several chances to get it to me on time and they didn’t care.

Review.Titre: All's good until shipped
Review.Contenu: All was good until my inverter was shipped. Truck freight inverter was shipped to my billing address (home) instead of work address with a loading dock. So I called the inverter store when I saw where it was going by tracking number. Customer service told me they would file for a change of destination with Fedex corporate. I continued to watch the tracking and still no change. I got a call from Fedex hub near me to verify because it was comming via semi truck so location was important, we live in the smoky mountains! I explained where it was supposed to go and they understood but the Inverter store must make the change but stayed in contact with me. I called the inverter store once again and explained to them it was not changed and I have the number and email for the Fedex hub where it is going. The inverter store told me they can't do that and will only refile with Fedex corprate (not very nice about it!) for a address change (which did not work the first time!). So I had to call the hub and arrange to leave work meet the driver in route because only the shipper can officially change the address. Seems to me they only cared about getting the sale and did not care about what happens to a 4000 shipment once its paid for. I build several home energy systems a year for folks with tiny houses and thought I would try them out. As of now I will not use them again so that is probably 10k worth of equipment I will purchase from someone else. Customer service is very important and was sorely lacking. Just my experience.

Review.Titre: Customer service is very rude will not…
Review.Contenu: Customer service is very rude will not listen and could care less if you do business with them or not.

Review.Titre: Bought a charger for my battery
Review.Contenu: Bought a charger for my battery.  Installed it and it diddnt work.  Tech support had me test it and told me to ship it back for a warrenty. At my expence.  They messaged me back that it was working and wanted to bill me for return shipping. $21 when i paid $12 to send it back. I had to call them and explain how it was broken and they retested. Called me back and told me it was indeed defective and told me they would send me a new one.  Then got an email that they are on back order. Had to call again and ask for a refund.  They did refund me the cost of the unit. But did not refund the shipping.  $18.  They are getting a poor rating because there product was defective and i feel they should refund me the shipping and reimburse me for the return shipping.  So. Buying an aims product costed me $30 for a defective part and a waisted month of my Life. Thaks aims!

Review.Titre: Can't get anyone tonteturn my calls.
Customer service is a joke
Review.Contenu: I purchased the wrong inverter. Sent it back brand new, never used in the same packaging than they charged me a restocking fee for used equipment, after I paid for return shipping. Than you get the replacement wanted me to pay more shipping, yet each order is free shipping. Returning item was a major headache. I did not get a replacement and went elsewhere

Review.Titre: Fast at getting me out the door but…
Review.Contenu: Fast at getting me out the door but when I got home my inverter had definitely been used or damaged before, there was dirt and placed on the housing showing wear... I would have returned but I simply didn't have the time I needed to get on the road ASAP so I just installed it anyway.

Review.Titre: More power !!!
Review.Contenu: Off grid Learning curve , going from modified, toPure sine wave was like turning on a switch , with Aims 3000 watt charger / inverter and fm80 outback solar controller. Yes still small , but off grid ! a power house up and running May 2nd 2020 is going to be a new world Thank you George

Review.Titre: Better off ordering over the phone.
Review.Contenu: The web site is really good at telling about the products they offer and they're kits. But the ordering experience was probably the worst I've ever had. It's very vague about how the product is shipped and there is no place for any kind of delivery instructions of any kind. When I ordered my kit I changed the email where I wanted correspondence sent but the website changed the email back to the previous one which held up my order for almost a week. And then when I finally called to find out what was going on with my order they were rude on the phone. I haven't got my kit yet so I can't say what kind of quality it is yet.

Review.Titre: Ordered and paid for the inverter on a…
Review.Contenu: Ordered and paid for the inverter on a Monday. Friday I was waiting for delivery and at 3P.M. I get a text saying shipment was cancelled. Called The Inverter Store and was told it was cancelled because of lack of payment. Checked bank account and the full amount had been deducted from my account 10 minutes after order was placed on Monday. Called back to The Inverter Store and was told they couldn't do anything for me. Asked to talk to the manager and was told that I was talking to the manager and they could do nothing for me but I could go online to order and pay another one. VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE. If they hadn't waited a week to inform me I could have bought from somewhere else and still had it on time for a very important use.

Review.Titre: The Inverter won't carry both of my…
Review.Contenu: The Inverter won't carry both of my freezers, as I was told it would.Also, called the help line, left a detailed message as I was instructed, never got a call back.

Review.Titre: Inverter not able to deliver as specified
Review.Contenu: The store's user experience, checkout and delivery was very smooth.The inverter I purchased is a "2000 WATT PURE SINE INVERTER WITH AUTOMATIC TRANSFER SWITCH 12 VDC TO 120 VAC ETL LISTED".  I installed the inverter in an application where I had previously been running a 1800W Xantrex modified sine wave inverter.The new, supposedly more powerful inverter, is unable to run my 1000w microwave oven (Emerson MW9113SS 1000 W Countertop Microwave Oven.  1000W O/P with 1450W I/P) which the Xantex 1800W modified sinewave inverter ran without issue.This is not an installation problem.  I am a certified Systems Engineering Technician.  I'm using 0/2 cables over about 8ft from my yacht's house batteries.  The inverter is being amply supplied.  It is simply not able to deliver what it is rated to.  I am now stuck with functionality well below where I was before I attempted to upgrade.  This has been a very disappointing experience.

Review.Titre: review before delivery
Review.Contenu: Maybe you should deliver on a product before asking me to review the inverter that is on back order for two months.

Review.Titre: The demo battery I received was…
Review.Contenu: The demo battery I received was defective.  According to the AIMSB bluetooth phone app, the battery shuts off at 60 % SOC.  This is less than half the rated capacity.I shipped the battery back to AIMS yesterday at my own expense.  I ask that the shipping charges be reimbursed.I will order a replacement battery.  Just not a demo.Since this is the second bad battery I have received, I would strongly advise checking these batteries for correct function before selling them.On the plus side, customer service  went above and beyond to keep lines of communication open and to remedy the situation. For that alone they should be commended.

Review.Titre: First purchaser
Review.Contenu: First purchase from them bought an invertor and a remote.shipping was prompt and merchandise packaged well.after a few weeks the power light on remote quit functioning called and got transferred to tech support left a message 5 days later I called back after no response from them.tech support finally returned my call and instructed me to visit website to submit warranty issue.Sales person was friendly on the phone tech support not so much

Review.Titre: Bad LCD and bad support
Review.Contenu: I installed my inverter without problems. However, the LCD screen, which I was charged $184 for, did not work properly. It showed load outputs that were way off what I was running. I called tech support, but they were of no help. I then called The Inverter Store and told them my problem, and they told me to return the item for possible replacement. I sent it back and was then notified that I needed to give them $13 for my LCD to be sent back to me. They never specified what was wrong, nor did they offer to refund the $10 I had to spend to send their defective product to them.

Review.Titre: I did not like the fact I had to wait…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the fact I had to wait to get an RMA via email, a day later, to return a faulty unit.  Most places give one out over the phone within a few minutes.  Down time is important to my company.  This was an unnecessary delay.

Review.Titre: I like the product quality and looks
Review.Contenu: I like the product quality and looks. I do not like the back order date, I understand you have no control over it please do the best you can to get me my inverter A.S.A.P.                                       Thank You, Mark P.

I wish I would have done a little more research before purchasing but I had recently bought a house that is completely ran in solar, I was in dire need of batteries to be able to make the house function, and I was recommended the inventor store by the original solar installer.

Review.Titre: Still haven't finished install so can't…
Review.Contenu: Still haven't finished install so can't comment on how it works, ordering process was moderately worrisome because sales people are reading from a script and technical people don't know sales and won't return messages left on the answering service, it's alot if money to spend on something since their last one only lasted 5 years for a stationary installation.

Review.Titre: I was hoping this 5000 watt 24v…
Review.Contenu: I was hoping this 5000 watt 24v inverter would outperform my old 3000 watt 12v inverter. It does not appear to so far. Not sure what the problem is yet. This 5000 watt inverter was missing the plastic connector covers depicted in the web site pictures. I found out later that they are no longer available. Seems like a potential shock hazard. Built in outlets are each only good for 1500 watts according to the manual.

Review.Titre: Received 200ah 12v lithium battery with…
Review.Contenu: Received 200ah 12v lithium battery with instructions about obtaining Bluetooth connection app on Google Play or iOS. But was unable to locate any such app. is why I only give 3 stars. Normally I don't participate in reviews unless I have a gripe. So be careful what you ask for, you've already got my money.

Review.Titre: The unit I purchased did not work when…
Review.Contenu: The unit I purchased did not work when I installed it. It took 3 tries calling to get in touch with someone to help me return the item. I was sent an RMA immediately and have returned the unit. They said it would take several days to credit me. It has been about a week and I'm still waiting for credit.

Review.Titre: Mixing Different Wattage Solar Panels
Review.Contenu: After contacting sales with a request for additional 265 watt panels was informed that they were obsolete and not longer stocked.  Sales stated that they had 275 watt that I could purchase.  What they did not state that you could not mix the two different wattage panels. After purchasing, receiving and installing them problems arose with the controller being damages.  At that point I had to revert to gird power as the system I have was off grid.  System was then useless.  Had to order a controller and pay for it as there was no warranty for this malfunction caused by AIMS Sales not informing me that you could not mix panels.

Review.Titre: Technical help was great
Review.Contenu: Technical help was great! Ordered what was suggested spending almost $3,000. Never had a question about the transaction until today when FedEx contacted me and ask me to drive 1 1/2 hours 1 way to pick up 2 of the packages because they weigh over 150lbs????? I asked them if that was the case then how were they shipped from Reno NV??? Lady told me I had 10 days to pick them up or they would send them back. I went and picked up my packages and it was an absolute nightmare!!

Review.Titre: Use a salesperson if you can.
Review.Contenu: Liked the chat support.  However would have preferred a salesperson to help with the order. Ordered wrong cables and probably would have been better off with different parts Rather than thinking I understood from chat discussions.  Did not work out as I hoped but will make use of what I purchased.

Review.Contenu: The price I paid for what I wanted was very good but I was not told the truth about what I ordered.  The person I live chatted with apparently didn't know enough about what they were selling.  I'm disappointed so far because the company refuses to make this situation right. I've emailed multiple times and get no help.  As of right now, I'm not sure if I will do business with this store again unless they are willing to work with me and correct this situation. If they were to make this situation right then I could say they earned 5 stars but so far that isn't was is going on.

Review.Titre: Haven't installed the inverter yet.
Review.Contenu: Haven't installed the inverter yet.Arrived sooner than estimated shipping ETA. 5 Stars... I am a little disappointed that it was made in China- thought it was made in Reno! Will provide more feedback when unit is installed and working.

Review.Contenu: I'm looking forward to using it. Its seems well built and arrived quickly but my good deal lithium lifepo4 battery took a crap. I will update review as soon as I get the battery issue taken care of. Thank you

Review.Titre: Great merchandise, unhappy shipping experience
Review.Contenu: I ordered twice, the first time being an inverter/charger and two 12 volt 100AH batteries, cables, etc.  Shipping was a little over $40.  The second order was for two more of the batteries and cables - shipping was over $60 for less merchandise.For the first order, which came on a pallet, the FedEx driver kindly delivered the pallet to my garage door.  The second order, not on a pallet, was unceremoniously dumped on my front porch, with not so much as a courtesy doorbell ring.  That's a FedEx issue, not Inverter Store.To say the least, I was not pleased by having to pay 50% more for a much worse shipping experience.The equipment and batteries definitely meet my expectations, very high quality.

Review.Titre: Caveat Emptor
Review.Contenu: I ordered a single solar panel rack mount from the Inverter Store. The description of the rack online did not give the dimensions, nor did it state what was in the box; there was only a picture.  The item was shipped via FedEx and arrived box open and torn; however, it did not appear pieces were missing.  I assembled the rack and it does not include a frame for the solar panel nor clamps for the pole, as shown in the web catalog picture.  I contacted Inverter Store requesting assistance.  It has been a week and I've not heard back from them.  The rack was $31 and I feel for that amount I should get more than a triangle and some screws.  This transaction was not the worst rip-off but was certainly far from stellar.

Review.Titre: Bad crimps on cable kit
Review.Contenu: Ordered a complete inverter kit, cables,& remote on/off! Upon installing I found the crimps for battery post weren’t crimped fully and deep enough... still a great all in one kit..... Cheers

Review.Titre: Wish it was better. Improving
Review.Contenu: 02/28/19The replacement unit arrived yesterday a day before the scheduled delivery date which was very nice. The unit appeared to be a new one despite the fact that I originally ordered a used unit. Thank you for that.I installed the unit last night and it appears to be functional. We will see if there is enough sun today to see it work from my control automatically.The Inverter Store did contact me to say they were addressing the packing issue and the fact that I got no answer about getting a schematic so I could repair my unit so that is an improvement. They appear to be addressing the issues that they can and I thank them for that.I am now going to set about getting my original unit repaired so I will have a spare. I will call the manufacturer and if that is not successful I will set about repairing it on my own.02/25/19The experience started with my nearly 4 year old inverter quitting. That was OK but when I called to ask how I send it back to be repaired I was told they only repair their inverter chargers. Since the charger part of that doesn't charge to a high enough voltage for my batteries so I can never own one of those. Requests for schematics so I can fix it myself were met with Silence.I decided to purchase one of their used ones to keep me going until I could figure out how to fix my failed one. The used one arrived missing the AC terminal strip screws and with a bent mounting bracket and two of the screws broken off because the packing allowed the inverter to move in the box. They had me send it back and told me when they got confirmation that it was picked up they would ship out a replacement. We will see what that looks like when it gets here.A little cooperation would help here. I have been without a working unit for several weeks now while I deal with this.

Review.Titre: Everything and Everyone helpful, BUT!
Review.Contenu: So, I want you to know that the Inverter Store is a great place to shop for our needs.  Angel on the tech side of Aims is helpful and knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with. BUT! Your customer service rep on the Inverter Store telephone has been one of the rudest and most unhelpful on your payroll.  I hate to even call her, she could really use some tact, she has none.  I couldn't even give you her name, because even when I ask for her name it isn't given. I have pushed for her name I think it is Christine? But not sure, I don't know maybe she could answer the phone with cheer in her voice and "Oh by the way this is (whatever is her name) HOW can I help you!  But no, it is like pulling teeth with the attitude one gets from your customer help line. She really needs an attitude adjustment.Christen Devine-Gonzales

Review.Titre: This is a great generator
Review.Contenu: This is a great generator!  I’m using it to power my cabin.  We have a 240 split system so I needed a generator with a 240 option.  It’s very quiet and takes quite a bit of load to change idle speed.  It is the EXACT same DB rating or maybe quieter compared to my neighbors Honda EU6500.  Very happy I purchased it.  And, if you have a problem, AIMS is very easy to deal with.

Review.Titre: Timely, Discounted, Excellent Condition
Review.Contenu: The inverter charger I bought as used and discounted works perfectly, it came within 3 days on the 10 day free shipping fee. I'm now able to refrigerate and power swamp cooler for my 110 degree Redding Ca. day, much appreciation! Will spend more there when able.

Of course, electrical disconnects, panels, breakers, etc., are not included.Sometimes, it is a little difficult to reach someone for questions , but, otherwise, very happy with purchase.It would be helpful if The Inverter Store offered Hybrid kits, equipment and support. It was the one area I found lacking

Review.Titre: Purchased a refinished 2000 watt  AIMS…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a refinished 2000 watt  AIMS inverter, ( Model : PWRI200012120S)The unit has performed as outlined in it's specifications. This is a 2nd unit( previous purchase was a 1000 watt AIMS model)  I've purchased  from this company.

Review.Titre: Purchased Aims 2000 watt inverter…
Review.Contenu: Purchased Aims 2000 watt inverter online and it arrived on time in perfect condition.I have only recently installed it in my Semi truck and it has.performed flawlessly thus far. I am using it to power my 700 watt microwave and phone and tablet chargers.It is made in China.

Review.Titre: Prompt helpful attention from tech support
Review.Contenu: I bought a rebuilt inverter that didn't work upon installation. I was assisted via tech support in determining that it was indeed the inverter and not my system so I could mail it back to be fixed. I was so happy to receive it back within a week of my mailing it out. Meaning only one day turnaround once it arrived back at the store. It gave me confidence that I would have personal attention for this very essential component of my tiny house solar system and that the AIMS power inverter itself was a durable piece of equipment worthy of rebuilding and fixing. I am very much in favor of such durability in a throwaway world.

Review.Titre: If you need tech advice ask for Andrew
Review.Contenu: If you need tech advice ask for Andrew. Very informative and patient. I’d give them five stars except the other tech was short and impatient. After that I just asked for Andrew. Did everything he said and my system works great. Andrew gets 6 stars.

Review.Titre: Good quality product
Review.Contenu: Good quality product.  I was pleasantly surprised to find it fit well under the solar panel when mounted. 4 stars because I found it slightly cheaper on AMAZON after I ordered it and I would like to see screw mount holes in it for a more firm mount.

I informed him that they did the hook up. He insisted on sending the fuse.Finally after some time I got some person who was more knowledgeable !! I order a new Inverter paid for it as a new order and did finally get a refund on the defective inverter unit that I returned.. The reason for the 4 stars is that the Inverter store did finally do what it should have done in the first place but some of the personnel believe you do not understand what is going on and that the units are  never defective . The new unit works fine!!!!

Review.Titre: With some extensive ‘hands on’ test…
Review.Contenu: With some extensive ‘hands on’ test trial experience with Aims Inverters and Lifepo4 batteries, and cabeling, including ‘real-world’ heavy inductive motor loading, I would (otherwise) rate Aims a full Five Stars, with my single reservation being their Technical help Dept, where product knowledge is uber vague and, mostly ‘on-the-fly’ improvised at best, with several of my email tech inquiries gone completely unanswered...I couldn't help but feel my email inquiries were being avoided (intentionally??), while during a separate phone-in tech related matter, experienced very rude phone demeanor (non-answer answers, argumentative!...) as well, demonstrating a complete lack of knowledge and unwillingness to answer the specifics of my product inquiry (i.e. Charger algorithms, ‘Smart fan’ meaning)...Hopefully, Aims will find a way correct this lone glaring departmental inadequacy, because other than this sole issue, regular ‘Customer Service’ is uber responsive, helpful and most pleasant to deal with : ) and the Aims products I’ve used (whether owned by me or others) are both solid and robust and a fair value...Despite this one recurring discrepancy, I could still recommend Aims Products to others (as I continue to...), and for a bit of advance clarity, note that product manuals (though sometimes sketchy...) can be found on their website...Still a 4 Star fan of Aims Products...

Review.Titre: Solar upgrade
Review.Contenu: The sales staff was excellent,  the only part that sucked was the Fed Ex was semi tractor trailer and they go 260 miles round trip out of thier way to get it here and it took more than 5 days. Fed ex freight only services the Forsyth,  Montana area on Tuesdays only 1 delivery day a week here, I don't know why they don't have a box truck, his trailer was practically empty and the driver wouldn't drive my road. I had to get my loader out and meet him on cherry creek rd. If I wouldn't have had the loader I wouldn't have been able to get my delivery.

Review.Titre: I have done business with the Inverter Store for over a decade
Review.Contenu: I have done business with the Inverter Store for over a decade, and for reliable equipment, equipment represented well, delivery and sales they are great.    I haven't dealt with their Technical group in the last three years, but to be able to contact their Technical group ( Aims Power ) three years ago was tough to get hold of a Technician. Back then, it was quite frustrating, since I run two 6,000 watt pure sine / stand alone projects here on my farm. One for our home, and one for my Garage with apartment and water wells.     We will see how this 'round goes.       Moscow, Idaho

Review.Titre: I received great advice from tech…
Review.Contenu: I received great advice from tech support, ordered the battery and in ten days time it was delivered and I installed it.  After two days running it was fully charged and held the same amount of energy as the former two batteries.  I trust the equipment made by Aims Power and the sales people at the inverter store are super at filling orders quickly, directing you to tech support when they don't have the answers and showing you where to find products at the online store.

Review.Contenu: I purchased refurbished unit but had issues with it's operation. Tech support was top notch, tech was in USA and we had solid communication. Unfortunately my unit was unusable. I DID experience anxiety at the start of the RMA process; ALL was resolved.I purchased a brand new unit and returned the problem unit with my delivery driver.Product is 12KW pure sine wave inverter, charger, and transfer switch. Using on a home solar project.My new system works wonderfully!! No Regrets.

Review.Titre: User-friendly website makes it easy to…
Review.Contenu: User-friendly website makes it easy to see what’s available and compare products. Shipping was quick and very reasonably priced. The inverter was very easy to install, all the connections are well labeled and the instructions are helpful. I would definitely recommend this company to anyone looking for inverter power.

Review.Titre: The shipment came quickly after being…
Review.Contenu: The shipment came quickly after being ordered.  All the contents were as promised.  The PV Combiner box door was easier to open and close with the locks than the first one.  However like the first PV Combiner box installing the negative output lead wire into place had difficulty clenching the wire as I turned the screw.  I had to insert the wire and try tightening it about fifteen times before finally I felt the screw holding the wire in place.  I cannot see the bottom of that insert without taking the box apart and have no idea what prevents the screw from finding and tightening down on the stripped wire end?  Maybe the third box will be different?  Otherwise all products worked well.PS. The panels are extremely even as my charge controllers tell me the input and output of both the first set and second set of panels I ordered are nearly identical.  Wonderful!

Review.Titre: This review is for: 300 WATT PURE SINE POWER INVERTER 12 VOLT 120 VAC INCLUDES CABLES
Review.Contenu: This review is for:300 WATT PURE SINE POWER INVERTER 12 VOLT 120 VAC INCLUDES CABLESOn sale $98.00Bought a Group Size 27 12 volt deep cycle marine battery to test the inverter.The inverter is fantastic. It puts out exactly what the house does, 122 volt. It is very accurate, with seemingly no noticeable variation in voltage. That may be important running a laptop, a modem and a router as in sensitive electronics. Where we live in se Texas, we experience an occasional power outage. Not looking to power the refrigerator, only small electronics such as computer equipment and charging phones and charging flashlights. Also run a few led lights. At 95 degrees in the garage, never once did the fan come on, meaning the whole operation is quiet, just like I like it.Kept it running all night, computer equipment with clamp lights and all, all night and it only took the battery down 15% in 12 hours running.Very low insufficiency at 10%I have a 2200-watt generator (inverter), but that is too much work for a 12 to 24 hours outage. It’s also too noisy, we have full house generators in our neighborhood, and they are way too loud.The 300-watt inverter is perfect for small things, and I don’t have to start the generator and mess with fuel for a 48-hour outage.Very handy, solid and easy to use.Single AC receptacle – USB PortAlso works great in the car, remember not to draw more than 180 watts when plugged into the cigarette lighter.The price includes two sets of wires.Enclosed DC battery connectionsConvenient cigarettes plug & alligator clips (To protect the vehicles wiring, the vehicles cigarette lighter adapter can only handle 180 watts, if you are going to use more than 180 watts you must wire inverter to battery)Continuous output power: 300 WattSurge power capability (peak power): 600 WattDC input / operating voltage: 10 to 15 VOutput voltage: 120 VOutput voltage regulation: +/- 3%Output wave form: pure sine waveOutput frequency: 60 Hz +/- 2HzDC amps: 25AC amps: 2.5Battery low voltage alarm: 10.5 +/- 0.5 VBattery low voltage shutdown: 10.0 +/- 0.5 VNo load power consumption: < 0.7 DC ampsFull load efficiency: 90%1/3 load efficiency: 95%No load minimum operating temperature: -15 degrees CelsiusFull load maximum operating temperature: 55 degrees Celsius (automatic shutdown)AC Output Socket Type: Type 2 -3 prongHigh input voltage protection: 15VLow input voltage shutdown: 10VProduct size (D x W x H): 7.25″ x 4.75″ x 2.125″

Review.Titre: Great little Generator
Review.Contenu: The service on line was excellent, my questions ask were answered immediately, purchase was hassle free, delivery was the fastest, received and used to to charge some batterys up in equipment and in our camper, very quiet, we bought it to take it with us in our side by side on camping trips, we love it so far!
